warscrolls.name: Chaos Knights
warscrolls.lore: The coming of the Chaos Knights heralds a crushing defeat for their adversaries. These dreaded champions charge fearlessly into the deadliest of battles, striking down foes all around them with sundering blows from their ensorcelled weapons.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Impaling Charge
abilities.lore: A charging Chaos Knight is capable of spitting several enemies at once with the point of their ensorcelled polearm.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of its **Cursed Lances**.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Legionnaires
warscrolls.lore: Sworn to Be’lakor, these warriors wage war on two different fronts. They openly march alongside the legions of Chaos, bringing ruin to the Mortal Realms, yet serve ulterior motives, seeking to undermine the Everchosen and secure the ascension of the First Prince in his stead.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/8), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Undivided

abilities.name: Sow Confusion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: To the disciples of Be’lakor, subterfuge and lies are as keen as any blade.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Mindstealer Sphiranx
warscrolls.lore: Mindstealer Sphiranxes are powerful and sinister telepaths. These cruel-hearted beasts enjoy nothing more than toying with their prey, plundering their innermost secrets before summarily ripping them to shreds with sharpened claws.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Dominate Mind
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: A Sphiranx can manipulate the actions of its enemies with a simple glance.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Realmscourge Rupture
warscrolls.lore: Realmscourge Ruptures are not subtle weapons. When the necessary magical power has been channelled and released by a tribal shaman, the land itself writhes in the grip of Chaos, sharpened spikes surging forth like an accursed tidal wave to overwhelm anything in their path.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Debilitating Shockwave
abilities.lore: The vicious spikes that erupt from an onrushing Realmscourge Rupture impale those unfortunate enough to be struck by them even as the tremors that accompany them send those nearby staggering.
abilities.declare: If this **MANIFESTATION** charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If any models in the target unit are slain by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Chieftain
warscrolls.lore: Darkoath Chieftains lead their barbarian tribes to war with the fury and conviction of the truly devoted. These masterful warriors are always seeking greater challenges, and their skill at arms is spoken of in awe by their followers.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as an *Oathsworn*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** this turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Tribal Warleader
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: With strength and fierce purpose, the rulers of the Darkoath tribes lead those sworn to their banners into the fray to fulfil their oaths.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DARKOATH INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord on Daemonic Mount
warscrolls.lore: Particularly favoured Chaos Lords may be granted a daemonic steed to bear them into battle. These champions become the rulers of feared cavalry warbands, driving their mounted brethren into battle with roared oaths to the Dark Gods.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: The Knights of Chaos
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: At the head of a charge, this Chaos Lord leads their cavalry to crush any foe before them.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO WARRIORS OF CHAOS CAVALRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Daemon Prince
warscrolls.lore: Daemon Princes are those champions who, through determination and countless atrocities, have surpassed the heights of the Path to Glory. Only the most vanishingly rare souls can hold the gods’ attention long enough to achieve this apotheosis, joining the infernal ranks of daemonkind as an embodiment of Chaos itself. The earth rebels at their presence, for they are things that should not exist. Palls of shadow surround a Daemon Prince as the land cracks and vomits torrents of hellflame. With talon and cursed blade, the Daemon Prince brings ruin to the realms, assured that there are none who might challenge them.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
**Marks of Chaos**
***During army composition, if this unit is part of a Slaves to Darkness army, you can pick 1 of the following Pledge to Chaos keywords for this unit***:

**• PLEDGED TO KHORNE**
**• PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH**
**• PLEDGED TO NURGLE**
**• PLEDGED TO SLAANESH**

***This unit is armed with Hellforged Weapons and has 1 of the following options:***
• ***Wings***
• ***Trophy Rack***

abilities.name: The Mounted Skulls of the Fallen
abilities.lore: Some Daemon Princes revel in glory with each worthy foe slain by their hands.
abilities.effect: If this unit has a **Trophy Rack**, its **Hellforged Weapons** also have **Anti‑HERO (+1 Rend)**.

abilities.name: Immortal Champion
abilities.lore: Those favoured enough to ascend to daemonhood are among the most deadly servants of the Ruinous Powers.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Airborne Horror
abilities.lore: Carried aloft by ragged leathery wings, this favoured champion of the Chaos Gods will bring ruin wherever they descend.
abilities.effect: If this unit has **Wings**, it has a Move characteristic of 10" and has **FLY**.

warscrolls.name: Darkfire Daemonrift
warscrolls.lore: Darkfire Daemonrifts are eldritch portals torn ajar by fell incantations. Once the veil has been sundered, raw magic seeping from the Realm of Chaos forms an opening for the horrors beyond to vent their spite, widened and empowered by spellcraft that draws upon the essence of Chaos.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Fuelled By Sorcery
abilities.lore: A Darkfire Daemonrift absorbs magical power, widening and expelling ever more gouts of ruinous sorcery as it hungrily devours arcane energies.
abilities.effect:
Each time a spell is successfully cast by a unit within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**, give this **MANIFESTATION** 1 **ruinous energy point**, to a maximum of 6.

Each time this **MANIFESTATION** uses a **SHOOT** ability, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its **Darkfire Torrent** for each **ruinous energy point** it has.

If this **MANIFESTATION** is removed from play, all of its **ruinous energy points** are lost.

warscrolls.name: Abraxia, Spear of the Everchosen
warscrolls.lore: Once a whelp in the Varanspire’s fighting pits, Abraxia has risen to command the Swords of Chaos – the infamous First Circle of the Varanguard. She is a warrior of matchless willpower, convinced that there is no challenge she cannot best through bloody-minded grit. To Abraxia, Chaos represents a state of perpetual testing rather than being embodied in four insane gods. Such an anti-deific attitude pleases Archaon, who offers Abraxia that rarest of boons – a measure of his trust. In her conquest of the Sigmarite city of the Phoenicium, Abraxia consumed the sacred fire at the bastion’s heart. Cinder now flickers when she speaks, while in her eyes rages a tortured and captive flame.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Roar of Domination
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Thanatorg is quick to put potential usurpers of Abraxia’s power in their place.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Blood of Molten Varanite
abilities.lore: Any who wound the Thanatorg risk being splashed by its highly mutative blood.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice each time a damage point inflicted by a combat attack is allocated to this unit. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **the Thanatorg’s Claws and Fangs** is 4.

abilities.name: Warlord of the First Circle
abilities.lore: Abraxia commands the Swords of Chaos with relentless brutality.
abilities.effect: If a friendly **Varanguard** unit uses the ‘Relentless Killers’ ability while it is wholly within 12" of this unit, that unit does not have **STRIKE-LAST** as a result of that ability.

abilities.name: Gorbolga the Accurs'd
abilities.lore: A ‘gift’ from the Everchosen, Gorbolga is a varanite spear that carries a potent mutative curse – but should its wielder’s will slip, they too will learn of its hunger…
abilities.effect:
If this unit is in combat, roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect:

***1 - Uncontrollable Power:***
Allocate 1 damage point to this unit.

***2 - The Spear Slumbers:***
No effect.

***3-5 - White-hot Varanite:***
Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Gorbolga** for the rest of the turn.

***6 - Rampant Mutation:***
The effect of ‘White-hot Varanite’ applies and this unit’s **Gorbolga** has **Crit (Mortal)** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Exalted Hero of Chaos
warscrolls.lore: Exalted Heroes are those warriors who have caught the notice of the gods and now seek to make a true name for themselves. Their favoured prey are monsters and enemy champions, for by slaying these foes an Exalted Hero proves their own might.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Glory-seeker
abilities.lore: To earn the favour of their patron, these formidable warriors ruthlessly hunt down enemy monsters and champions.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for attacks that target **HEROES** or **MONSTERS**.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Marauders
warscrolls.lore: Each and every Darkoath warrior is trained in the way of the axe and the sword from the youngest age. Having sworn bloody oaths to their patron gods, they seek to fulfil them by any means necessary, their bodies flushed with power by every pledge completed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Glorious Death
abilities.lore: Ever keen to earn the favour of their tribe, when the eyes of the fiercest fighters are upon them, these warriors will not go down without a fight.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly **DARKOATH HEROES**, each time a model in this unit is slain by a combat attack and that model was in combat with the attacking unit, roll a dice. On a 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Oath of the Marauder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: These bloodthirsty tribal warriors loudly declare vows of violence and slaughter as they race after their foes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Slaughterbrute
warscrolls.lore: Even the greatest champions cannot hope to bind a Slaughterbrute through physical might alone. Only through specially forged blades of binding can these monstrosities be controlled, and their boundless fury directed towards their master’s enemies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Khorne

abilities.name: Rampaging Charge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Slaughterbrute crashes into the enemy’s ranks in a frenzy of destruction.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target unit is **INFANTRY**, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Razor-tipped Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Sigils of  Domination
abilities.lore: By carving runes of domination into a Slaughterbrute’s back and driving cursed blades of binding into its flesh, the monster’s will can be bound to a champion of Chaos.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO** within this unit’s combat range to be this unit’s master.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, while this unit is within its master’s combat range, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

warscrolls.name: Raptoryx
warscrolls.lore: One of the many forms of wildlife twisted by the power of Chaos, Raptoryx cross the land in vast flocks. Cunning and vicious beasts, they are willing to take on prey many times their size, pulling them down in a frenzy of slashing talons and snapping beaks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Crazed Flock
abilities.lore: A flock of snapping, screeching Raptoryx is capable of swiftly bringing down any prey should they catch them unawares.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Warriors
warscrolls.lore: Clad in hellforged iron and swollen with dark blessings, Chaos Warriors are the bane of civilisation. Entire legions of these armoured killers march into battle in search of divine favour, each warrior the equal of several lesser mortals.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Bringers of Desolation
abilities.lore: Chaos Warriors fight with relentless ferocity in those places consecrated to the Dark Gods.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Rune-etched Weapons** while it is contesting an objective you control.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Spawn
warscrolls.lore: Those who receive too many gifts from the gods may degenerate into a hideous Chaos Spawn. Lumpen and misformed, these creatures lurch from their lairs when death is on the wind, slaughtering all before them with flailing tentacles and crooked claws.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Drawn to Power
abilities.lore: Even cursed with their hideous and twisted form, Chaos Spawn still covet the boons of the Dark Gods and are drawn to those most favoured by their patron.
abilities.effect: While this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **Daemon Prince**, you can re-roll the random characteristic rolls for this unit’s Move and Attacks characteristics.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Fellriders
warscrolls.lore: The Darkoath prize speed and agility above all in their light cavalry. Fellriders are mounted daredevils, outflanking their foes on lightning-swift and aggressive mounts, riddling their ranks with volleys of javelins before charging in to deal the killing blow.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
***Each model in this unit is armed with Warsteed’s Hooves and 1 of the following options:***

***• Marauder Javelin***
***• Fellrider Blades***

abilities.name: Swift Attackers
abilities.lore: As they close in on the enemy at frightening speed, these skilled horsemen are nigh impossible to hit with missile fire.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Oath of the Raider
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Before battle, Fellriders swear oaths to harry the enemy without mercy, showing no mercy to those stragglers who fall beneath their axes.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase and is only in combat with 1 enemy unit, and that enemy unit is only in combat with this unit, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s weapons for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Gaunt Summoner
warscrolls.lore: To the daemonic Gaunt Summoners, reality is but a plaything. At the will of their master Archaon they lead armies of mortals to wreak terrible havoc. They can consume their foes in hellfire and manipulate realmgates to summon minions to their side in a matter of moments.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Divert Realmgate
abilities.lore: Whispering fell incantations, a Gaunt Summoner can temporarily divert the path of a realmgate, allowing malefic Chaos entities to storm the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Units set up this turn using this unit’s ‘Book of Profane Secrets’ ability can be set up wholly within 18" of this unit and more than 7" from all enemy units instead of the distances in the ability.

abilities.name: Minions of the Silver Tower
abilities.lore: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve **in a Silver Tower**. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Book of Profane Secrets
abilities.lore: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit **in a Silver Tower** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Gaunt Summoner on Disc of Tzeentch
warscrolls.lore: The Gaunt Summoners are strange daemon-sorcerers of Tzeentch bound to the will of the Everchosen. Some glide above the battlefield on scintillating Discs of Tzeentch, laying the enemy low with arcane power and cursed daggers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Cavalry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Minions of the Silver Tower
abilities.lore: The warped fortresses of the Gaunt Summoners are infested with their thrall hosts.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that has not been deployed to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target is set up in reserve **in a Silver Tower**. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Book of Profane Secrets
abilities.lore: Using this arcane tome, the Gaunt Summoner calls forth minions from their Silver Tower.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit **in a Silver Tower** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up the target on the battlefield wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Arcane Imprisonment
abilities.lore: Gaunt Summoners delight in banishing foes to their Silver Towers.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the unmodified casting roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed. For the rest of the battle, that unit cannot be picked to be the target of an ability that allows a replacement unit to be set up.

warscrolls.name: Varanguard
warscrolls.lore: Each of the Varanguard is a mighty champion who has passed the many tests set for them by Archaon and sworn themselves to his service. Riding atop their hulking steeds, these lords of darkness bring inescapable death to the Everchosen’s enemies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Relentless Killers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Varanguard have slaughtered foes beyond counting, butchering their way across the battlefields of the Mortal Realms without mercy.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Warqueen
warscrolls.lore: A Darkoath Warqueen has proven herself the rightful ruler of her barbarian tribesfolk time and again. She has sworn dread pacts to bring carnage to the Mortal Realms, and all who stand in her way must face both her wrath and that of her devoted warriors.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Supremacy
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: By the will of the gods, this warrior leads her barbarous horde into the lands of the enemy, allowing none to oppose them.
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within enemy territory and charged this phase, for the rest of the battle, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **DARKOATH** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Ruin-blessed Conqueror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A Warqueen heeds the whispers of the gods, ravaging lands in their name and drawing their gaze onto her warrior hordes.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that this unit is contesting.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, other friendly **DARKOATH** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are contesting that objective.

warscrolls.name: Centaurion Marshal
warscrolls.lore: The Centaurion Marshals are creatures of terrifying stature that serve as focal points for the First Prince’s legions, commanding warriors sworn to them with cunning and tactical guile before charging headlong into the fray, where they wreak havoc upon the enemy.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Marshal of the Legions
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Not only formidable combatants, Centaurion Marshals lead the forces of the First Prince into battle with an iron fist.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO DAEMON** or **Chaos Legionnaires** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Sorcerer Lord
warscrolls.lore: The very air around a Sorcerer Lord is saturated with dark magic. With their command of daemonic powers and gift of foresight, these warlocks bolster the power of their allies while unleashing their own devastating spellcraft on the enemy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Oracular Visions
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: A sorcerer can temporarily bestow the gift of foresight upon their allies, helping them ward against enemy blows.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **WARRIORS OF CHAOS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a dice.
abilities.effect: On a 3+, the target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Eightfold Doom-Sigil
warscrolls.lore: Eightfold Doom-Sigils are icons of Chaos in all its glory, blazing symbols of pure ruin. To fall in the presence of such a sorcerous construct is to be damned, for these lingering spells hungrily suck souls into the Realm of Chaos for the gods to feast upon.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Empowered By Atrocity
abilities.lore: The souls of those slain in the presence of an Eightfold Doom-Sigil are absorbed by the magical manifestation, feeding the Dark Gods’ eternal hunger and inspiring their servants to battle all the harder, even as their own lives are offered in tribute.
abilities.effect: If 2 or more units (friendly or enemy) were destroyed this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Ogroid Theridons
warscrolls.lore: Serving as shock troops to the armies of Chaos, these formidable warriors are found where the fighting is thickest, wielding both monstrous strength and honed martial skill to carve swathes of ruin through the ranks of the enemy.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Unleashed Savagery
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Suppressing their savage spirit no more, these ferocious warriors hack at the foe in a bestial frenzy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Archaon, the Everchosen
warscrolls.lore: Archaon is the Everchosen, champion of the Ruinous Powers, anointed in the blood of butchered empires. Many worship him as a demigod of Chaos, the primordial ruin of the false god Sigmar. It is true that the Everchosen despises the God-King – but he reserves similar loathings for the Brothers in Darkness, and indeed all deities. Were Archaon’s ultimate goals to be realised, it would be his banners alone rising over the charred corpse of the realms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: The Eye of Sheerian
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Torn from the corpse of a mighty dragon, this artefact grants Archaon visions of future events.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. This roll replaces the priority roll of the next battle round. On a 1-3, your opponent must take the first turn of that battle round. On a 4-6, you must take the first turn of that battle round. This ability cannot be used if there is an enemy **Archaon** on the battlefield.

abilities.name: The Slayer of Kings
abilities.lore: This ancient daemonblade thirsts for the souls of champions and warlords.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a **FIGHT** ability, if the unmodified wound roll for 2 or more attacks made with **The Slayer of Kings** that target the same **HERO** is 6, that **HERO** is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Dorghar’s Claws and Tails** is 4.

abilities.name: Three-headed Titan
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The greater daemons consumed by Dorghar imbue the Everchosen’s steed with unlimited power.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Filth-spewer:*** Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit, to a maximum of 7. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit.

***Skull-gorger:*** Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit and roll a dice. If the roll exceeds that unit’s Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is that unit’s Health characteristic.

***Spell-eater:*** Pick a **MANIFESTATION** within 12" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 2+, it is banished and inflict D3 mortal damage on the unit that summoned it.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord
warscrolls.lore: Chaos Lords are dark champions who have walked the Path to Glory and are now only one step away from glory or damnation. They are the rulers of great warbands and hordes, and their followers will die before failing these fearsome warlords.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Glory In Battle
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Under the command of their warlord, the warriors sworn to them waste no time in slaying the enemy.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO WARRIORS OF CHAOS INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Lord on Karkadrak
warscrolls.lore: Karkadraks are monstrous lizard-beasts clad in thick scales, whose destructive rampages are almost impossible to stop. Only the strongest Chaos Lords can dominate a Karkadrak, but those who succeed become truly deadly linebreakers.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Brutush Rampage
abilities.lore: A charging Karkadrak is an almost unstoppable force, capable of smashing straight through even the most determined shieldwall.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick up to 3 enemy units within 1" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Drive The Legions Forward
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Mounted atop a mighty Karkadrak, the Chaos Lord signals the charge.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly non-**HERO** non-**CAVALRY WARRIORS OF CHAOS** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for the targets for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Chieftain on Warsteed
warscrolls.lore: Only the mightiest and most ruthless Darkoath warriors may rise to command their tribe in battle. Their killing prowess honed by years of strife and slaughter, they lead their people to victory after bloody victory, claiming heads with every swing of their cursed weapons.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as an *Oathsworn*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Murder
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Darkoath Chieftains offer up the souls of enemy lords and champions in exchange for divine power.
abilities.effect: If this unit destroyed an enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** this turn, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Cavalry Warleader
abilities.lore: The Darkoath Chieftain leads the cavalry swiftly into the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll charge rolls for friendly **DARKOATH CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Ogroid Myrmidon
warscrolls.lore: Myrmidons are masters of the Varanspire’s fighting pits, and have spent decades mastering the gladiatorial arts. In battle they lead those who seek to join the Everchosen’s legions, for to impress a Myrmidon is to be marked for glory.
warscrolls.notes: This **HERO** can join an eligible regiment as a *Ruinous Champion*.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Myrmidon Rage
abilities.lore: Every wound inflicted on a Myrmidon only serves to stoke its rage further.
abilities.effect: While this unit is damaged, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons.

abilities.name: Pit Master
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Myrmidons are given governance over the gladiatorial pits of the Varanspire, and all who have fought there willingly follow them into the fray.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Ogroid Theridons** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Chariot
warscrolls.lore: The chariots of Chaos are implements of crushing death that leave a wake of corpses. Forged from black iron, they are capable of attaining remarkable speed in spite of their bulk, converting gathered momentum into deadly force as they hurtle into the enemy ranks. It is considered a great honour to make war from a chariot, for these constructs are as pulpits from which the murderous will of the Dark Gods can be enacted.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
***This unit is armed with a Lashing Whip, Chaos Steeds’ Trampling Hooves and 1 of the following options:***

• ***Chaos War-flail***
• ***Chaos Greatblade***

abilities.name: Swift Death
abilities.lore: Chaos Chariots are at their most deadly on the charge, where their considerable bulk and bladed wheels can cause untold devastation.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Savagers
warscrolls.lore: Screaming blood-curdling vows to the Ruinous Powers, the Darkoath Savagers make brutal war across the length and breadth of the Mortal Realms. To these barbarous marauders, each new dawn is an opportunity to win the favour of the gods.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Oath of Conquest
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Heeding their Godspeaker’s proclamations, these warriors seek to earn glory by driving back the enemy.
abilities.effect: If this unit is contesting an objective you control that is wholly within enemy territory, this unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.name: Darkoath Wilderfiend
warscrolls.lore: Wilderfiends are both guardians and persecutors of the Darkoath tribes. Once mortal heroes themselves, they have been warped and twisted into hunched abominations that crave flesh and wield powers of primal sorcery to annihilate their prey.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (5+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath

abilities.name: Primal Sorcery
abilities.lore: Though bestial, Darkoath Wilderfiends possess innate powers of sorcery.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

***Mind Shroud:*** Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of **sacrifice points** this unit has. If any of the rolls are a 5+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

***Warping Balefire:*** Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target and roll a number of dice equal to the number of **sacrifice points** this unit has. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

***Dark Might:*** **Heal (X)** this unit, where **X** is the number of sacrifice points this unit has.

After applying the effect you picked, reset this unit’s **sacrifice points** to 0.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Feed on Flesh
abilities.lore: Having been appeased with sacrificial blood, this creature may bestow dark blessings upon its kin.
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this unit, give this unit a **sacrifice point**, to a maximum of 6. If there are more than 1 friendly **Darkoath Wilderfiend** units within 12" of the slain model, only 1 of them can be given a **sacrifice point** for that slain model.

warscrolls.name: Fomoroid Crusher
warscrolls.lore: Brutish creatures from a lost age, the Fomoroid Crushers now exist only to tear down and destroy. In battle they fly into a terrible rage, torturous memories of the creatures they once were lending their blows a maddened strength.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Cursed Destroyers
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Once skilled masons, these creatures have been cursed by the Everchosen to now live only to destroy.
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 1" of this unit, then pick each other unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Gorebeast Chariot
warscrolls.lore: Only the most brutal of champions can hope to yoke one of the grotesque Gorebeasts to their will. These unnatural creatures lie somewhere between a monstrous simian and a Ghurish rokodile, and one swing of their fists can punch clean through a mortal’s chest. Once bludgeoned into submission, a Gorebeast’s strength allows them to pull a Chaos Chariot with relative ease. It is often more difficult to get the creature to stop, as they smash aside enemy regiments and barrel onwards in search of more foes to crush.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
***This unit is armed with a Lashing Whip, Gorebeast’s Crushing Fists and 1 of the following options:***

• ***Chaos War-flail***
• ***Chaos Greatblade***

abilities.name: Brutal Momentum
abilities.lore: The ferocity of Gorebeasts is terrible to behold as they carve a path of bloody destruction through the enemy ranks.
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Power Through’ command, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target and add 3" to the distance this unit can move as part of that ability.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Chosen
warscrolls.lore: Devotees of Chaos who garner many dark rewards may rise to the ranks of the Chosen. Armed with wicked soul-cleaving weapons, these champions fight at the forefront of the Chaotic hordes, inspiring their brethren through acts of brutal violence.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Warriors of Chaos

abilities.name: Heralds of Ruination
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Paragons of the Dark Gods, Chaos Chosen cut a swathe through the enemy lines, leaving nothing but blood and ruin in their wake.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Be'lakor, the Dark Master
warscrolls.lore: Once, Be’lakor – first of the Daemon Princes – stood paramount before the Ruinous Powers. How he fell from these heights is not known; likely his ambitions played a part, for Be’lakor craves godhood. His punishment was to crown each Everchosen but be denied the mantle himself. Yet Be’lakor is a creature of matchless cunning; even as he raged at his predicament, nursing hatred for the ‘False King’ Archaon, he schemed to reclaim his place at the forefront of the hordes of Chaos.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

abilities.name: The Dark Master
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Many puppets dance on Be’lakor’s infernal strings. Few realise as much until their fate is sealed.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target is picked to use an ability, roll a dice as a reaction. On a 3+, that ability has no effect.

abilities.name: Enfeeble Foe
abilities.lore: With a series of hissed incantations, Be’lakor instils visions of loss and despair in the minds of his enemies to drain them of their fighting spirit.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Subtract 1 from hit rolls from the target’s combat attacks.
• The target’s combat attacks cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

abilities.name: Shadow Form
abilities.lore: Be’lakor can shift his physical form to be as insubstantial as the mists of Ulgu – and just as hard to land a telling blow upon.
abilities.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Blade of Shadows** is 6.

abilities.name: Deadly Trap
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Dark Master delights in lethal reversals of expectation and fate.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** units within this unit’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, that target has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Gunnar Brand
warscrolls.lore: Gunnar Brand is a legend amongst the Darkoath tribes of the eastern Great Parch. His warrior skills, coarse charisma and raw grit have seen him emerge triumphant against seemingly impossible odds time and again. Many whisper that Gunnar’s brother forged a deal with a Wilderfiend and that the Chaos Gods have their gaze upon him.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn

abilities.name: Oath of Bloodshed
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Though he is contemptuous of the gods, Gunnar is still Darkoath; he is not so foolish as to reject their boons should they seek to reward his murder-making.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if any enemy **HEROES** were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn.
abilities.effect: Friendly **GUNNAR’S OATHSWORN** units have **WARD (4+)** for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Carve a Path To Glory
abilities.lore: Ruthless in battle, Gunnar Brand closes in on the enemy’s champions, claiming skulls and earning glory with each swing of his axes.
abilities.declare: This unit can only use this ability if it is in combat with an enemy **HERO**.
abilities.effect: This unit can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn. When using the second **FIGHT** ability, this unit must pick an enemy **HERO** to be the target of all of its attacks.

warscrolls.name: Eternus, Blade of the First Prince
warscrolls.lore: Sworn to Be’lakor and granted immortality, Eternus rides at the head of First Prince’s legions, crushing those who oppose his ascension. His mighty weapons are not his only means of waging war, for Eternus commands a vast network of spies and warriors loyal to the Dark Master.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness

abilities.name: Veins of Black Lightning
abilities.lore: Reborn in the Cursed Skies above the realms, Eternus’s soul is tethered to the Mortal Realms through the dark magics of his master; whenever he is struck down, a flash of black lightning sees him stand defiant once more.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. Add 1 to the roll if a friendly **Be’lakor** is on the battlefield. On an 8+, set up a replacement unit on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Network of Spies
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit
abilities.lore: Eternus commands a legion of agents and operatives to ensure he is always one step ahead of his enemies.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the enemy unit is in combat with a friendly **Chaos Legionnaires** or **Chaos Furies** unit. On a 5+, that command has no effect. The command still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

warscrolls.name: Chaos Furies
warscrolls.lore: Furies are spiteful daemonic imps that throng those lands under the sway of Chaos. Though individually weak, when they swarm they can prove surprisingly deadly, waiting until the foe’s back is turned before launching vicious hit-and-run attacks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon

abilities.name: Sneaky Little Devils
abilities.lore: Chaos Furies are spiteful creatures that utterly loathe the idea of engaging in a fair fight, much preferring – where possible – to stab distracted enemies in the back.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

warscrolls.name: Mutalith Vortex Beast
warscrolls.lore: Within the pulsating star suspended above the back of a Mutalith Vortex Beast can be found a portal to the Realm of Chaos itself. These horrific monsters constantly seethe with the power of mutation, those around them rewrought into horrific forms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Daemon, Pledged to Tzeentch

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Betentacled Maw** is 8.

abilities.name: Mutant Regeneration
abilities.lore: This unnatural abomination is invigorated by the raw power of Chaos.
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Aura of Mutation
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: To stand near a Mutalith can have horrific consequences.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice and apply the corresponding effect below. If this unit is wholly within 12" of a friendly **PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH WIZARD**, you can roll 2 dice instead, pick either result, then apply the corresponding effect below.

**1 - *Untouched***
No effect.

**2 - *Hideous Disfigurement***
Subtract 3 from the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

**3 - *Troggbrains***
The target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

**4 - *Gift of Mutations***
Subtract 1" from the target’s Move characteristic for the rest of the battle.

**5 - *Horrific Absorption***
Inflict D6 mortal damage on the target. Then, **Heal (D6)** this unit.

**6 - *Transmogrification***
Pick any other effect.

warscrolls.name: The Oathsworn Kin
warscrolls.lore: Gunnar Brand is a hero amongst the Darkoath tribes of Aqshy, but he could not have won his greatest victories without the aid of his companions. The Oathsworn Kin form his closest circle of confidants – Dendrel Direbrand and Warqueen Tanari cave in skulls with hammer and spear while Broken Nadja trails behind, her deadly incantations reducing foes to madness.
warscrolls.notes: This unit can only be taken in **Gunnar Brand**’s regiment. This unit cannot be reinforced.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
***• Warqueen Tanari and Dendrel Direbrand are each armed with a Heavy Darkoath Weapon.***
***• Broken Nadja is armed with a Gnarled Staff.***

abilities.name: Withering Death
abilities.lore: Nadja spits a vile curse in the Dark Tongue, drawing unnatural shadows to coil around an enemy champion and sap their life force.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target and subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Broken Nadja
abilities.lore: Broken Nadja wields the energies of ruin itself through dark incantations.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Broken Nadja** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Nexus Chaotica
warscrolls.lore: True champions of Chaos recognise that the gods demand more than simple slaughter. The realms themselves must be laced with taint; the arcane ley lines must be inundated with corruption. This is the purpose of the Nexus Chaotica, a shrine raised at a geomantic confluence for the express purpose of withering it.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness
warscrolls.wargearOptionsText:
**The following universal terrain abilities apply to this terrain feature (Terrain, 1.2):**

**Cover, Impassable**

abilities.name: Infernal Sorcery
abilities.lore: A sorcerer of Chaos can draw upon the bound daemons of the Nexus Chaotica to empower their spellcasting.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 3 or more **power points**, pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** within 3" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove 3 **power points** from this terrain feature, then add 1 to casting rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Corrupt The Realms
abilities.lore: These diabolical constructs use harnessed daemonic power to corrupt the geomantic energy of the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has 9 or more **power points**, pick an objective or terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature to be the source. Then, pick any number of enemy units within 3" of the source to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove 9 **power points** from this terrain feature, then roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Draw Power
abilities.lore: Constructed at confluences where magical ley lines converge, a Nexus Chaotica can draw power from the realms and into a floating crucible.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Give a number of **power points** to this terrain feature equal to the roll. This terrain feature can have a maximum of 12 **power points** at once.

warscrolls.name: Singri Brand
warscrolls.lore: Singri is the daughter of Gunnar Brand, heir apparent to the Darkoath tribes of the Snow Peaks. She charges into battle with a brash ferocity, one that often vexes her father, yet none are as capable as she at teasing out speed from a warhorse, nor as skilled in loosing pinpoint arrows while galloping at full tilt as Singri.
warscrolls.notes: This unit can only be taken in **Gunnar Brand**’s regiment.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Chaos, Slaves to Darkness, Darkoath, Gunnar’s Oathsworn

abilities.name: Swift As The Wind
abilities.lore: Singri’s horsemanship is unrivalled by any of the Darkoath. She weaves deftly across the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire and loosing deadly accurate shots with her bow in return..
abilities.effect: Only critical hits score successful hits for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Uncanny Shot
abilities.lore: Gunnar Brand has been saved on more than one occasion by a well-placed arrow from Singri.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s **Singri’s Warbow** for attacks that target enemy units that are within 6" of a friendly **Gunnar Brand**.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Nurgle
battleTraits.lore: The Father of Plagues bestows gifts of rot and decay upon his followers.
battleTraits.effect: Friendly ****PLEDGED TO NURGLE**** units have **WARD (6+).** If a unit already has **WARD (6+),** it has **WARD (5+)** instead.

battleTraits.name: Dark Apotheosis
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Favoured by the Dark Gods, this champion is bestowed with fell glory.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit with 8 or more **Dark Apotheosis** points to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following:

***Aura of Chaos***: **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is the number of damage points allocated to the target. In addition, the target has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the battle.

***Daemonhood***: Set up a ****Daemon** Prince** within 1" of the target. Then, remove the target from the battlefield. If the target is your general, the ****Daemon** Prince** becomes your general instead. If the target has any enhancements, the ****Daemon** Prince** has those enhancements instead. If the target has a **Pledge to Chaos** keyword, the ****Daemon** Prince** has the same keyword. Otherwise, pick 1 **Pledge to Chaos** keyword for the ****Daemon** Prince** to have for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Pledge to Chaos
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Slaves to Darkness forsake their souls by pledging to the Dark Gods.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-****UNIQUE** SLAVES TO DARKNESS** unit that does not already have one of the keywords below to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following **Pledge to Chaos** keywords:

• ****PLEDGED TO KHORNE****
• ****PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH****
• ****PLEDGED TO NURGLE****
• ****PLEDGED TO SLAANESH****

The target has that keyword for the rest of the battle.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Tzeentch
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: Reality twists and weaves around these warriors as they become intertwined in the machinations of the Change God.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly ****PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH**** unit to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll 2D6. Then pick a point within a number of inches of the target equal to the roll. Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of that point and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Khorne
battleTraits.lore: The Blood God instils a blind rage in his most frenzied adherents.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ****PLEDGED TO KHORNE**** units.

battleTraits.name: Pledged to Slaanesh
battleTraits.lore: The thrill of battle drives these warriors to charge at spectacular speed.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making **charge** rolls for friendly ****PLEDGED TO SLAANESH**** units, to a maximum of 3.

battleTraits.name: Eye of the Gods
battleTraits.lore: The mortal champions of Chaos seek to attract the notice of the gods by performing great deeds in battle.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-****UNIQUE** **WARRIORS OF CHAOS**** or ****DARKOATH** **HERO**** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
During the battle, the target gains **Dark Apotheosis** points as follows:

• Each time the target uses a ****FIGHT**** ability, it gains D3 **Dark Apotheosis** points.
• At the end of each of your turns, if the target is contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory, it gains D3 **Dark Apotheosis** points.

battleTraits.name: Dreaded Arrival
battleTraits.lore: To the thunderous beating of flame-trailing hooves and clattering Chaos Armour, the knights arrive to shatter the enemy.
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit wholly within your territory, within 1" of a battlefield edge and more than 6" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Eye of the Gods
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: The Slaves to Darkness seek to attract the notice of the gods by performing great deeds in battle.
battleTraits.declare:
Pick one of the following friendly units to use this ability:

• A unit that is **contesting an objective not controlled by your opponent** and is not in combat.
• A unit that **destroyed an enemy unit** this turn.
battleTraits.effect: Roll once on the **Eye of the Gods table** for that unit. That unit gains the **Eye of the Gods** passive ability that corresponds to the roll (the unit keeps all Eye of the Gods abilities gained in previous turns). If the same unit gains the same ability more than once in the battle, the effects are **not** cumulative.
battleTraits.altText: D6 roll of 1. Snubbed by the Gods. No effect. D6 roll of 2. Ward of Tzeentch. This unit has Ward (6+). D6 roll of 3. Grace of Slaanesh. Add 1 to run rolls for this unit. D6 roll of 4. Blessing of Nurgle. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target this unit. D6 roll of 5. Fury of Khorne. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons. D6 roll of 6. Champion of Chaos. Pick any ability from the table.

battleTraits.name: Oaths of Darkness
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: The Darkoath are roving barbarian raiders who seek to prove their might by swearing oaths of bloodshed and murder to the Dark Gods.
battleTraits.effect:
You can reveal 1 **battle tactic card** in your hand to your opponent. If you do so, that **battle tactic card becomes your **oath**** for the rest of the turn.

While this **battle tactic card is your **oath****, you can still use the command on it, or attempt to score the battle tactic on it, as normal.

If you score the battle tactic on your **oath** this turn, your **oath** is **fulfilled.** Instead of discarding the card, it is placed to one side but you can still use the command on it. Once you do so, the card is discarded as normal. Fulfilled oaths placed to one side in this way do not count towards the 3 battle tactic cards you can have in your hand.

If you use the command on your **oath** before it is scored, it is discarded as normal. At the end of the turn, if the **oath** is still in your hand and that **oath** has not been fulfilled, it ceases to be your **oath**.

heroicTraits.name: Favoured of the Pantheon
heroicTraits.lore: The gods watch this warlord’s deeds particularly closely.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is picked as the target of the ‘Eye of the Gods’ ability, it gains 3 **Dark Apotheosis** points.

heroicTraits.name: Deathmonger
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
heroicTraits.lore: Feared across the realms, this hero leaves naught in their wake but a trail of sun-bleached bones.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can use 2 ****FIGHT**** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Radiance of Dark Glory
heroicTraits.lore: In the presence of this champion, the mutative energies of Chaos can seal shut even the most grievous of wounds.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick each damaged friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, **Heal (1)** the target. **Heal** **(3)** the target instead if it is a ****MONSTER****.

regimentAbilities.name: Fierce Conquerors
regimentAbilities.lore: These warriors are hell‑bent on desecrating the territory and holdings of any who dare oppose them.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **Chaos Warriors** units.

regimentAbilities.name: The Dread Banner
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of the First Battle Round
regimentAbilities.lore: Marked with sigils of each of the Dark Gods, those who bear this banner seek ruinous blessings whatever their provenance.
regimentAbilities.effect: You can immediately roll on the Eye of the Gods table for that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Fearless Invaders
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: These warriors are skilled raiders, riding into enemy settlements to plunder and pillage before retreating from more organised resistance.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in combat to be the target.
regimentAbilities.effect: If the target uses a ****RETREAT**** ability this turn, no mortal damage is inflicted on it and it can still use ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Rage of Arkhar
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: Unholy anger is stoked in the hearts of these warriors, filling them with hate-fuelled stamina.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit in combat to be the target.
regimentAbilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

**Designer’s Note:** *This does not affect* **Companion** *weapons.*

spearheadEnhancements.name: Mark of Nurgle
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Father of Plagues has blessed your general with unnatural resilience.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for combat attacks that target your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Mark of Tzeentch
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The Changer of the Ways shapes the destiny of your general and grants them the ability to twist and warp the realms around them.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly unit on the battlefield. You cannot pick your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 6" of your general and more than 6" from all enemy units. It cannot use ****Move**** abilities for the rest of the phase.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Mark of Slaanesh
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general is bound to the Dark Prince, who, for the price of their soul, gifts them inhuman grace and martial skill.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Mark of Khorne
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This general serves the Blood God and promises to deliver endless carnage upon the battlefield in return for his dark gifts.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of your general’s melee weapons if they charged in the same turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Bloodthirsty Blade
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The runes engraved upon this weapon hungrily absorb the lifeblood of those it bites into.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: The Rend characteristic of your general’s **Rune-etched Axe** is 2.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Godshadow Talisman
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This unassuming amulet subtly alters the bearer’s form so that even the most determined strikes have a chance to harmlessly pass through them.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Champion of Raids
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Darkoath Warqueen is renowned for her lightning raids. With speed, momentum and swift violence, her forces surprise and overwhelm those who stand in her way.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick another friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general to be the target.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: The target can re-roll **charge** rolls for the rest of the turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Fell Ritualist
spearheadEnhancements.lore: On the eve of battle, the tribe’s Godspeakers gather to enact a fell ritual to deliver prophecies of the battle to come.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Each time you draw battle tactic cards, if your general is on the battlefield, you can choose to draw 1 additional battle tactic card, then put 1 of your battle tactic cards in your hand back at the bottom of your battle tactic deck.

artefactsOfPower.name: Realmwarper's Twist-rune
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: One who bears this cursed rune can bind warped landscapes to their will. Ruptured chasms open as thick palls of dark energy obscure the favoured and their servants from view.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If the target does not have the ‘Obscuring’ terrain ability, it gains that ability until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a dice for each model (friendly and enemy) within 1" of the target. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that model’s unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Infernal Puppet
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
artefactsOfPower.lore: As it dances upon the aetheric winds, this eldritch marionette violently disrupts the spellcraft of enemy mages.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a visible enemy ****WIZARD**** within 24" of this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: For the rest of the turn, each time the target is picked to use a ****SPELL**** ability, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target as a reaction. If the target is destroyed by this ability, do not resolve the effect of that ****SPELL**** ability.

artefactsOfPower.name: The Conqueror's Crown
artefactsOfPower.lore: This blasphemous diadem grants the bearer dominion over the minds of lesser mortals.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy ****INFANTRY**** units while they are in combat with this unit.

regimentOfRenown.name: Ironclad Despoilers
regimentOfRenown.lore: Punching into the enemy lines like a mailed fist, once these warriors have taken a vital position on the battlefield, little can be done to wrest control from them.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
Add 1 to save rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown while they are contesting an objective you control.

Add 1 to wound rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown while they are contesting an objective you do not control.

regimentOfRenown.name: Gifts of Chaos
regimentOfRenown.lore: This daemon takes to the field redolent with god-given gifts.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
• If this unit has the **BLADES OF KHORNE** keyword, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its **Hellforged Weapons**.

• If this unit has the **DISCIPLES OF TZEENTCH** keyword, it has ****WIZARD** (1)**.

• If this unit has the **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE** keyword, it has **WARD (5+)**.

• If this unit has the **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH** keyword, add 1 **run** rolls and **charge** rolls for it.

regimentOfRenown.name: Godmarked Legion
regimentOfRenown.lore: The mightiest of warriors in the godmarked legions of Chaos can be elevated to daemonhood should their patron deem them worthy.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
The unit in this Regiment of Renown gains the ‘Gifts of Chaos’ ability and one of the following faction keywords that matches your army’s faction:

• **BLADES OF KHORNE**
• **DISCIPLES OF TZEENTCH**
• **MAGGOTKIN OF NURGLE**
• **HEDONITES OF SLAANESH**

regimentOfRenown.name: Bellow of Gorkamorka
regimentOfRenown.lore: Goroan shamans who maintain the old ways channel the sense-blasting roars of Gorkamorka through their magic.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick the **Ogroid Thaumaturge** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this **spell**, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
regimentOfRenown.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** until the start of your next turn. In addition, while the target has the **BURNING** keyword, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

regimentOfRenown.name: Goroan Forgecraft
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: The Goroans were renowned for their skill at smithery, and even orruks will acknowledge their general killiness.
regimentOfRenown.declare: Pick a friendly **DESTRUCTION **HERO**** that is wholly within the combat range of a ****HERO**** in this Regiment of Renown to be the target.
regimentOfRenown.effect: On a 3+, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

otherEnhancements.name: The Dread Banner
otherEnhancements.lore: Marked with sigils of each of the Dark Gods, the bearers of this banner strike fear into those who oppose them.
otherEnhancements.effect: While this unit includes any standard bearers, enemy units cannot use commands while they are in combat with this unit.

otherEnhancements.name: The Blasted Standard
otherEnhancements.lore: Woven from threads of dark magic, this standard is inscribed with writhing runes and surrounded with the coruscating fires of change.
otherEnhancements.effect:
This unit has the ****PLEDGED TO TZEENTCH**** keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, this unit has **WARD (4+)** against damage inflicted by shooting attacks.

otherEnhancements.name: The Eroding Icon
otherEnhancements.lore: As this fell icon arrives upon the enemy line, warriors find their weapons corroding and crumbling to rust.
otherEnhancements.effect:
This unit has the ****PLEDGED TO NURGLE**** keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, attacks that target this unit cannot score critical hits (treat them as regular hits instead).

otherEnhancements.name: The Banner of Rage
otherEnhancements.lore: Sewn from strings of congealed gore, this banner radiates bloodlust so strong that those beneath it are goaded into a state of permanent rage.
otherEnhancements.effect:
This unit has the ****PLEDGED TO KHORNE**** keyword.

In addition, while this unit includes any standard bearers, add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

otherEnhancements.name: The Banner of Screaming Flesh
otherEnhancements.lore: Fashioned from flayed aelven faces that scream in perpetual agony, the exhilarating pitch of this banner heightens the senses of the followers of the Dark Prince.
otherEnhancements.effect:
This unit has the ****PLEDGED TO SLAANESH**** keyword.

In addition, if this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Daemonic Speed
abilities.lore: Infernal winds blow at the back of these hordes, speeding them into battle against the enemies of the gods.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Spite-tongue Curse
abilities.lore: Uttering the foul syllables of the Dark Tongue until blood pours from their mouth, the caster beseeches the Chaos Gods to destroy their enemies – though such pacts carry with them a terrible cost…
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6. If the casting attempt is unsuccessful or if the spell is unbound, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.
abilities.effect: Inflict 3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Binding Damnation
abilities.lore: At the caster’s urging, tendrils of raw Chaos burst from the tortured ground, entwining the limbs of their enemies and rendering them easy prey.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Summon Darkfire Daemonrift
abilities.lore: Darkfire Daemonrifts are eldritch portals torn ajar by dark incantations. Once the veil has been sundered, raw magic seeping from the Realm of Chaos forms an opening for the horrors beyond to vent their spite, widened and empowered by spellcraft that draws upon the essence of Chaos.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Darkfire Daemonrift** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Darkfire Daemonrift** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Eightfold Doom-sigil
abilities.lore: Eightfold Doom-Sigils are icons of Chaos in all its glory, blazing symbols of pure ruin. To fall in the presence of such a sorcerous construct is to be damned, for these lingering spells hungrily suck souls into the Realm of Chaos for the gods to feast upon.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Eightfold Doom-sigil** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up an **Eightfold Doom-sigil** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them

abilities.name: Summon Realmscourge Rupture
abilities.lore: Realmscourge Ruptures are not subtle weapons. When the necessary magical power has been channelled and released by a tribal shaman, the land itself writhes in the grip of Chaos, sharpened spikes surging forth like an accursed tidal wave to overwhelm anything in their path.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Realmscourge Rupture** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Realmscourge Rupture** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: United in Darkness
abilities.lore: The myriad forces of Chaos march to war under a common cause, led by warlords who have put aside their rivalries in the name of laying waste to the lands of a shared foe.
abilities.effect: While there is at least 1 friendly **WARRIORS OF CHAOS HERO** and 1 other friendly **DAEMON HERO** or **DARKOATH HERO** on the battlefield, add 2 to the control scores of friendly **SLAVES TO DARKNESS** units while they are contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory.

abilities.name: Rally The Tribes
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: One of the horde’s commanders looses a terrifying battle cry, calling more of their blade-sworn warriors to their side.
abilities.declare: If there is a friendly **DARKOATH HERO** on the battlefield, pick a friendly non-**HERO** non‑**UNIQUE DARKOATH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Ironclad Onslaught
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
abilities.lore: When a Chaos horde is on the march, the realms tremble. Hundreds of heavily armoured warriors desecrate all in their path as they roar oaths to the Dark Pantheon.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective that is contested by any friendly units to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place a **defiled token** next to the target objective. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting an objective that has a **defiled token**. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Feral Ruin
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for a friendly Daemon Prince unit
abilities.lore: A Daemon Prince’s unholy radiance draws to them the most savage of chaotic creatures, abominations against nature that hunger to spill blood.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SLAVES TO DARKNESS MONSTER** or **BEAST** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.
abilities.usedBy: The **Daemon Prince** unit using that **FIGHT** ability.
